definition: A vast and mysterious realm located beneath the ocean's surface, characterized by extreme depths and darkness. It is often explored and studied by scientists, marine biologists, and oceanographers to understand its unique ecosystems and discover new species.

examples.german: Die Tiefsee ist der dunkle und kalte Bereich des Meeres.
examples.english: The deep sea is the dark and cold area of the ocean.

examples.german: In der Tiefsee leben viele faszinierende und seltsame Kreaturen.
examples.english: Many fascinating and strange creatures live in the deep sea.

examples.german: Die Tiefsee ist noch weitgehend unerforscht.
examples.english: The deep sea is still largely unexplored.

examples.german: Tiefsee-Tauchboote werden verwendet, um in die Tiefsee hinabzutauchen.
examples.english: Deep-sea submersibles are used to dive into the deep sea.

examples.german: Die Tiefsee ist ein extrem lebensfeindlicher Ort.
examples.english: The deep sea is an extremely hostile environment.
